Html:
This was something we asked for a while back when they solicited input on Prism vNext.  I would love to see it.

I would also love to see it extended across the process boundary.  Turn the event aggregator / Rx pattern into an IPC mechanism that can do pub sub.  Even if it is limited to prism app to prism app, it would be a start. 

So, I agree.  Good Post
